name: Nights At Survival Pizzeria
description:
Welcome to the night pizzeria!
You have to stay nights at pizzeria! Hide from the evil mechanical rabbits. These robots behave unpredictably!
Be a night guard in a pizzeria, track the movements of animatronics, close the doors on their approach and turn on the light to frighten them away!

You need to be careful, because your supply of electricity is limited.
Remember - they move only when you do not see them! Use it to protect yourself from their attack!
The time is displayed at the top of the screen. Try to survive until morning!

Game features Nights at Survival Pizzeria:
- realistic pizzeria
- a frightening atmosphere
- nights with increasing complexity
- beautiful 3D graphics
